```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        .quiz-container {
            max-width: 600px;
            margin: 20px auto;
            padding: 25px;
            border: 4px ridge #ff6b9d;
            border-radius: 0px;
            font-family: 'Arial Black', Arial, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff6b9d 25%, transparent 25%), 
                        linear-gradient(-45deg, #ff6b9d 25%, transparent 25%), 
                        linear-gradient(45deg, transparent 75%, #ff6b9d 75%), 
                        linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent 75%, #ff6b9d 75%);
            background-size: 20px 20px;
            background-position: 0 0, 0 10px, 10px -10px, -10px 0px;
            background-color: #ffd93d;
            box-shadow: 8px 8px 0px #333, 12px 12px 0px #666;
        }
        
        .question {
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            padding: 20px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8e6cf 0%, #88d8c0 50%, #7fcdcd 100%);
            border: 3px solid #333;
            border-radius: 0px;
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #333;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .question::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: -3px;
            left: -3px;
            right: -3px;
            bottom: -3px;
            background: repeating-linear-gradient(
                45deg,
                #ff6b9d,
                #ff6b9d 2px,
                #ffd93d 2px,
                #ffd93d 4px
            );
            z-index: -1;
            border-radius: 0px;
        }
        
        .question h3 {
            color: #333;
            margin-top: 0;
            margin-bottom: 18px;
            font-weight: 900;
            text-shadow: 2px 2px 0px #fff;
            font-size: 18px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }
        
        .options {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        
        .option {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 12px 15px;
            border: 2px solid #333;
            border-radius: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            background: #fff;
            font-weight: bold;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .option:hover {
            background: #ffeb3b;
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #333;
        }
        
        .option:active {
            transform: translate(0px, 0px);
            box-shadow: 2px 2px 0px #333;
        }
        
        .option input {
            margin-right: 12px;
            transform: scale(1.2);
            accent-color: #ff6b9d;
        }
        
        .submit-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff6b9d 0%, #c44569 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 15px 30px;
            border: 3px solid #333;
            border-radius: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-top: 25px;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #333;
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #333;
        }
        
        .submit-btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #c44569 0%, #ff6b9d 100%);
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 6px 6px 0px #333;
        }
        
        .submit-btn:active {
            transform: translate(0px, 0px);
            box-shadow: 2px 2px 0px #333;

        .submit-btn:disabled {
            background: #999;

            box-shadow: 2px 2px 0px #666;

        .results {
            margin-top: 30px;
            padding: 25px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a8e6cf 0%, #7fcdcd 100%);
            border: 3px solid #333;

            box-shadow: 6px 6px 0px #333;

        .results::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;

        .results h3 {

        .reset-btn {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #6c5ce7 0%, #a29bfe 100%);
            color: white;
            padding: 10px 20px;
            border: 2px solid #333;
            border-radius: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
            margin-left: 15px;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: bold;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.5px;
            box-shadow: 3px 3px 0px #333;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;

        .reset-btn:hover {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #a29bfe 0%, #6c5ce7 100%);
            transform: translate(-1px, -1px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #333;
        }
        
        .reset-btn:active {
            transform: translate(0px, 0px);
            box-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #333;

        /* High contrast mode for accessibility */
        @media (prefers-contrast: high) {
            .quiz-container {
                background: #fff;
                border: 4px solid #000;
            }
            
            .question {
                background: #f0f0f0;
                border: 3px solid #000;
            }
            
            .option {
                background: #fff;
                border: 2px solid #000;
            }
            
            .option:hover {
                background: #e0e0e0;

        /* Reduced motion for accessibility */
        @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
            .option,
            .submit-btn,
            .reset-btn {
                transition: none;

<body>
    <div class="quiz-container">
        <form id="quizForm">
            <div class="question">
                <h3>How interactive is your coding experience?</h3>
                <div class="options">
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q1" value="A">
                        A) I mostly run .py or .R scripts without needing notebooks or other interactive consoles.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q1" value="B">
                        B) I experiment a lot with code, using a mix of scripts, notebooks, and a console.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q1" value="C">
                        C) I solely use notebooks for my experiments.
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="question">
                <h3>How do you explore data?</h3>
                <div class="options">
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q2" value="A">
                        A) I have small or medium data that I would like to explore with an interface.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q2" value="B">
                        B) I have small, medium, or large data that I would like to explore with an interface.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q2" value="C">
                        C) I don’t need to view my data in an explorer format.
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="question">
                <h3>Do you love virtual environments?</h3>
                <div class="options">
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q3" value="A">
                        A) I might use multiple virtual environments, but don’t switch frequently.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q3" value="B">
                        B) I use many virtual environments and want the to experiment with them at the same time. 
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q3" value="C">
                        C) I use 0-1 virtual environments.
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="question">
                <h3>Are you a data author?</h3>
                <div class="options">
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q4" value="A">
                        A) I use authoring tools like Quarto, but do not need a rich environment.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q4" value="B">
                        B) I use authoring tools like RMarkdown and Quarto and would like UI for common tasks.
                    </label>
                    <label class="option">
                        <input type="radio" name="q4" value="C">
                        C) I am comfortable using Quarto on the command line or using other tools for authoring.
                    </label>
                </div>
            </div>

            <button type="button" class="submit-btn" onclick="calculateResults()">Get Results</button>
        </form>

        <div id="results" class="results" style="display: none;">
            <h3>Your Quiz Results:</h3>
            <div id="resultContent"></div>
            <button type="button" class="reset-btn" onclick="resetQuiz()">Take Quiz Again</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        function calculateResults() {
            const form = document.getElementById('quizForm');
            const formData = new FormData(form);
            
            // Check if all questions are answered
            const questions = ['q1', 'q2', 'q3', 'q4'];
            for (let q of questions) {
                if (!formData.get(q)) {
                    alert('Please answer all questions before getting results.');
                    return;
                }
            }
            
            // Count A, B, C responses
            let countA = 0, countB = 0, countC = 0;
            
            for (let q of questions) {
                const answer = formData.get(q);
                if (answer === 'A') countA++;
                if (answer === 'B') countB++;
                if (answer === 'C') countC++;
            }
            
            // Determine dominant type
            let dominantType = '';
            let maxCount = Math.max(countA, countB, countC);
            
            if (countA === maxCount && countA > countB && countA > countC) {
                dominantType = "Type-A Chameleon. You're flexible enough to handle any project, but particular enough to spend three hours perfecting your workspace setup.";
            } else if (countB === maxCount && countB > countA && countB > countC) {
                dominantType = "Professional Alchemist. You have enterprise-level versatility with a secret statistician lurking inside, ready to unleash data magic.";
            } else if (countC === maxCount && countC > countA && countC > countB) {
                dominantType = "Free Spirit. Intuitive, visual, and convinced that the journey of discovery is just as important as the destination.";
            } else {
                // Handle ties
                if (countA === countB && countA > countC) {
                    dominantType = "Ambitious Diplomat. You want professional success AND academic credibility, basically the overachiever who also reads research papers for fun.";
                } else if (countA === countC && countA > countB) {
                    dominantType = "Strategic Visionary. You balance practical efficiency with creative exploration, like a who musician practices scales religiously but improvises jazz solos.";
                } else if (countB === countC && countB > countA) {
                    dominantType = "Artistic Scholar. You believe beautiful code should produce beautiful insights, preferably with beautiful statistical backing.";
                } else {
                    dominantType = "Analytically Ambidextrous. You are equally comfortable debugging production code, crafting statistical models, or prototyping in interactive notebooks.";
                }
            }
            
            // Display results
            const resultContent = document.getElementById('resultContent');
            resultContent.innerHTML = `
                <div class="result-item"><strong>A responses:</strong> ${countA}</div>
                <div class="result-item"><strong>B responses:</strong> ${countB}</div>
                <div class="result-item"><strong>C responses:</strong> ${countC}</div>
                <div class="result-item" style="margin-top: 15px; font-size: 18px; color: #007bff;">
                    <strong>Your Primary Type: ${dominantType}</strong>
                </div>
            `;
            
            document.getElementById('results').style.display = 'block';
            document.getElementById('results').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
        }
        
        function resetQuiz() {
            document.getElementById('quizForm').reset();
            document.getElementById('results').style.display = 'none';
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```
